InitialFeedbackHistory: 30/04/2024 [REDACTED] note that the source data that you describe are considered existing data that you reuse, you can check both boxes and move the information from the last subquestion under data to the question about data reuse. [REDACTED] using laptops, hard drives and dropbox to share data is not the most secure solution, please have a look at the storage guide for solutions recommended by KU [REDACTED] most of these make automatic backups: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en 22/04/2024 [REDACTED] submitted the RDM questions from your application; at this stage of your fellowship, FWO expects a more detailed DMP using the [REDACTED] standard DMP template. [REDACTED] can find the template in dmponline.be where with guidance per question; or als word template on https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/ where you you can also find the FWO guidelines. [REDACTED] more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance
label: good with suggestions
